name: Suspicious Get Local Groups Information with WMIC
description: Detects execution of wmic utility with the "computersystem" flag in order to obtain information about the machine such as the domain, username, model...etc.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\wmic.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:wmic.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ computersystem\ * AND process.command_line:*\ get\ *))`
